tv: From the Earth to the Moon
title: Apollo One
episode_desc: NASA prepares for the Apollo 1 mission, then investigates the cause of the mission's tragic cabin fire.
show_desc: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.

episode_desc: During the turbulent year of 1968 Susan Borman looks with dread on her husband's impending mission to orbit the moon.

tv: From the Earth to the Moon
title: We Interrupt This Program
episode_desc: The Apollo 13 mission as seen through the reporting of two newscasters, highlighting the changing character of news coverage.
show_desc: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.

tv: From the Earth to the Moon
title: For Miles and Miles
episode_desc: Ten years after becoming the first American in space Alan Shepard battles back from health problems to command the Apollo 14 mission.
show_desc: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.

title: Galileo Was Right
episode_desc: The Apollo 15 astronauts and backup crew go through extensive geology training in preparation for their mission.

tv: From the Earth to the Moon
title: Le voyage dans la lune
episode_desc: The last manned Apollo mission to the moon is juxtaposed with Georges Méliès' filming of Le voyage dans la lune (1902).
show_desc: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.

tv: From the Earth to the Moon
title: The Original Wives Club
episode_desc: The lives of the astronaut wives during their NASA years and beyond - through speaking engagements and fashion shows, alcoholism and divorce.
